snippet.title: PSX Longplay [166] Motor Toon GP
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Deskawa

This is the first game from the later known as Polyphony Digital (Gran Turismo series), and the third game launched for PSX. It's a blend between Mario Kart and Ridge Racer, and it's not as bad as it looks. The lack of content is definitely its biggest problem. It was only released in Japan, but its sequel was released worldwide with its name, so it can be confusing for most people. This is the real Motor Toon GP, and the one released in USA and Europe is Motor Toon GP 2.

This LP covers the main game until 21:32, and after that the rest of the circuits that can only be played in the trial time mode (or with another player with 2 tvs and psx linked). -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
